H3.text: where does the red river start and end in louisiana. the Texas Panhandle

A4.text: The Red River begins at the junction of Buck Creek and Prairie Dog Town Fork, in Harmon County, Oklahoma.

A5.text: It forms much of the eastern border of Miller County, Arkansas, turning south near Fulton and flowing into Louisiana, where it feeds the Atchafalaya River.
